short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing WebGuard, a One-Stop-Shop for Internet Safety!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing WebGuard, a One-Stop-Shop for Online Safety! WebGuard blocks Trackers from Following you Online and Protects your data from Hackers. Adverts are automatically Removed from all Pages you view, bringing you an Ad-Free Browsing experience!
